Package by.bsu.soroka.lab.server.service.impl

Class BasicServiceImpl<T>

java.lang.Object
by.bsu.soroka.lab.server.service.impl.BasicServiceImpl<T>
Type Parameters:
T - One of entities. See Product, Stock, Storage.
All Implemented Interfaces:
BasicService<T>, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProductServiceImpl, StockServiceImpl, StorageServiceImpl
public class BasicServiceImpl<T>
extends Object
implements BasicService<T>
Used to avoid cope repetition, describes basic data-access functions Access to storage obtained via DAOProvider.
Author:
Soroka Egor
See Also:
BasicService

  • Method Details

    • getAll

      public List<T> getAll() throws ServiceException, RemoteException
      Returns all entities of BasicServiceImpl from data-storage. Access to storage obtained via DAOProvider. Guaranteed, that return-type is Serializable
      Specified by:
      getAll in interface BasicService<T>
      Returns:
      all entities of BasicServiceImpl
      Throws:
      ServiceException - thrown in case, of same logical errors.
      RemoteException - thrown in case of some connection errors.
      See Also:
      BasicService

    • add

      public int add​(T t) throws ServiceException, RemoteException
      Add entity t to data-storage. Access to storage obtained via DAOProvider.
      Specified by:
      add in interface BasicService<T>
      Parameters:
      t - entity, that will be added.
      Returns:
      Identifier of newly added entity. See Identifiable
      Throws:
      ServiceException - thrown in case, of same logical errors.
      RemoteException - thrown in case of some connection errors.
      See Also:
      BasicService

    • removeById

      public boolean removeById​(int id) throws ServiceException, RemoteException
      Remove entity from data-storage. Access to storage obtained via DAOProvider.
      Specified by:
      removeById in interface BasicService<T>
      Parameters:
      id - Identifier of entity, that should be added. See Identifiable
      Returns:
      true in case, that entity was successfully removed, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      ServiceException - thrown in case, of same logical errors.
      RemoteException - thrown in case of some connection errors.
      See Also:
      BasicService
